name: Sliding Chicken's INSANE Bowling
description:
Controls

WASD to move the ball

This is a spin-off of upcoming game Sliding Chicken! In Sliding Chicken's INSANE Bowling you get to go bowling in the first person view and dodge obstacles! Have fun and follow 2BrosInACup for more updates on this game and the release of The Mystifying Trial and Sliding Chicken!

Credits

Main Developer : Joey C

Music : Brian K

Version 1.1
